name: Amy Tan
title: Innovation Chair at Harvard Undergraduate Women in Business

education.name: Harvard University
education.description: Activities and Societies: Innovation Chair in Women in Business, Social Innovation Collaborative, Crisis Director of Harvard Model United Nation's Security Council, Director of Harvard National Model UN's Constitutional Drafting Committee of Nigeria in 1975, Intercollegiate Model UN

education.name: Eden Prairie High School
education.description: Activities and Societies: Captain of the Policy Debate Team, President of Youth in Government, President and Founder of the EP Model UN club, President of the National Honor Society, DECA, Business Professionals of America, Band

companies.title: Innovation Chair
companies.description: Organized the Innovation Competition with 100+ attendees from 28 universities, spearheaded a social innovation program to tackle local issues through human-centered design, managed initiatives that promoted women in tech/entrepreneurship

companies.title: Research Assistant
companies.description: Conducted experiments analyzing the disparities in educational opportunities of ex-felonsTranscribed interviews studying the Gacaca Courts System following the Rwandan Genocide.

companies.title: Research Assistant
companies.company: University of Minnesota - Carlson School of Management
companies.description: Researched the recent phenomenon of electronic word-of-mouth and analyzed different response methods that most effectively dissipated complaints through case studies of major shoe and shampoo brands.

companies.title: Tutor
companies.description: Tutored Somalian refugees in a variety of subjects.
